Articles.Content: Ksp weekly does not come out until tuesday. And i would like to know as soon as it happens on this thread. So, what is the current status?

ITS NEVER GOING TO COME OUT! HAHA!

but really, maybe 4 weeks from now?
Squad is working on it. You now know as much as the rest of us.
T_T i want capn to see this SO KEEP ON POSTING

If you read The last one... R&D is just entering testing.

If you read the dev blog on how they're handling testing now then you know that each piece gets some individual testing time before the whole thing is tested together.

And you should know that R&D is the largest piece of .22

Adding that all together and we have .22 wrapping up active development and soon to be entering the test phase as a whole. But this is just my guess based on what I cited above. I'm not expecting them to announce that .22 is in the testing phase this Tuesday. I would expect it closer to the one after. But again things can happen and no dev is going to say how close to the testing phase they are until they're there.

Absolutely no telling. The notification system that they set up to let us know where the release is in the development path is pretty much borked because they changed the process of testing. With that said, it's anyone's guess. Pessimistic estimates say at least another month. Again, no telling when they will release the update.
Um, does't discussing the release date just push it back another day???

Um, does't discussing the release date just push it back another day???

Every time when someone say "when will .22 come out?", The update gets push back a minute( Think about how many people say that....now stop thinking about it)

No one knows when the update will come around because a lot of things can happen during QA/experimentals that could push it away, and for good measures Squad never gives release dates because even them don't know. Just wait for the weekly as you said and look out for the developer's notes, this is the best info you'll have. Thread closed
